languages.text: "Но ведь ты правда не еретик и чтишь Императора?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"
languages.original_text: "Но ведь ты правда не еретик и чтишь Императора?"

traits.locale_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You are of the Emperor's faithful?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You are of the Emperor's faithful?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You are of the Emperor's faithful?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You are of the Emperor's faithful?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"
"You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

languages.text: "Ihr seid gar kein Ketzer, oder? Ihr seid ein ergebener Diener der Imperators?"
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid gar kein Ketzer, oder? Ihr seid ein ergebener Diener der Imperators?"

languages.text: « Ne me dites pas que vous êtes un hérétique... Vous servez fidèlement l'Empereur, j'espère ? »
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne me dites pas que vous êtes un hérétique... Vous servez fidèlement l'Empereur, j'espère ? »

languages.text: «No será usted un hereje de verdad, ¿no? ¿Es un siervo fiel del Emperador?».
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

traits.locale_text: «No será usted un hereje de verdad, ¿no? ¿Es un siervo fiel del Emperador?».

languages.text: 「実のところ、異端者ではないんじゃないか？お前は皇帝に忠実に仕えているのだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

traits.locale_text: 「実のところ、異端者ではないんじゃないか？お前は皇帝に忠実に仕えているのだろう」

languages.text: “你该不会真的是个异端分子吧？你会虔诚地侍奉帝皇吗？”
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"

traits.locale_text: “你该不会真的是个异端分子吧？你会虔诚地侍奉帝皇吗？”

languages.text: "Gerçekten de kâfir değilsin, değil mi? İnançla İmparator'a hizmet ediyorsun yani?"
languages.original_text: "You are not actually a heretic, are you? You serve the Emperor faithfully?"
